summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1351, for the improvement of Fourth Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers, catch basins, manholes, and other appurtenances under Ordinance No. 14999 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
